input:
On the desk, you see the following objects arranged in a row: a magenta crayon, a grey cat toy, a pink fidget spinner, a yellow booklet, and a gold jug. What is the color of the object furthest from the yellow object?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
